verses.verse: Then David<WH1732> said<WH559>, This is the house<WH1004> of the LORD<WH3068> God<WH430>, and this is the altar<WH4196> of the burnt offering<WH5930> for Israel<WH3478>.

And David<WH1732> commanded<WH559> to gather together<WH3664> the strangers<WH1616> that were in the land<WH776> of Israel<WH3478>; and he set<WH5975> masons<WH2672> to hew<WH2672> wrought<WH1496> stones<WH68> to build<WH1129> the house<WH1004> of God<WH430>.

And David<WH1732> prepared<WH3559> iron<WH1270> in abundance<WH7230> for the nails<WH4548> for the doors<WH1817> of the gates<WH8179>, and for the joinings<WH4226>; and brass<WH5178> in abundance<WH7230> without weight<WH4948>;
Also cedar<WH730> trees<WH6086> in abundance<WH369><WH4557>: for the Zidonians<WH6722> and they of Tyre<WH6876> brought<WH935> much<WH7230> cedar<WH730> wood<WH6086> to David<WH1732>.

And David<WH1732> said<WH559>, Solomon<WH8010> my son<WH1121> is young<WH5288> and tender<WH7390>, and the house<WH1004> that is to be builded<WH1129> for the LORD<WH3068> must be exceeding<WH4605> magnifical<WH1431>, of fame<WH8034> and of glory<WH8597> throughout all countries<WH776>: I will therefore now make preparation<WH3559> for it. So David<WH1732> prepared<WH3559> abundantly<WH7230> before<WH6440> his death<WH4194>.
¶ Then he called<WH7121> for Solomon<WH8010> his son<WH1121>, and charged<WH6680> him to build<WH1129> an house<WH1004> for the LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>.
And David<WH1732> said<WH559> to Solomon<WH8010>, My son<WH1121>, as for me, it was in my mind<WH3824> to build<WH1129> an house<WH1004> unto the name<WH8034> of the LORD<WH3068> my God<WH430>:

But the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came to me, saying<WH559>, Thou hast shed<WH8210> blood<WH1818> abundantly<WH7230>, and hast made<WH6213> great<WH1419> wars<WH4421>: thou shalt not build<WH1129> an house<WH1004> unto my name<WH8034>, because thou hast shed<WH8210> much<WH7227> blood<WH1818> upon the earth<WH776> in my sight<WH6440>.

Behold, a son<WH1121> shall be born<WH3205> to thee, who shall be a man<WH376> of rest<WH4496>; and I will give him rest<WH5117> from all his enemies<WH341> round about<WH5439>: for his name<WH8034> shall be Solomon<WH8010>, and I will give<WH5414> peace<WH7965> and quietness<WH8253> unto Israel<WH3478> in his days<WH3117>.

He shall build<WH1129> an house<WH1004> for my name<WH8034>; and he shall be my son<WH1121>, and I will be his father<WH1>; and I will establish<WH3559> the throne<WH3678> of his kingdom<WH4438> over Israel<WH3478> for<WH5704> ever<WH5769>.
Now, my son<WH1121>, the LORD<WH3068> be with thee; and prosper<WH6743> thou, and build<WH1129> the house<WH1004> of the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430>, as he hath said<WH1696> of thee.

Only the LORD<WH3068> give<WH5414> thee wisdom<WH7922> and understanding<WH998>, and give thee charge<WH6680> concerning Israel<WH3478>, that thou mayest keep<WH8104> the law<WH8451> of the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430>.

Then shalt thou prosper<WH6743>, if thou takest heed<WH8104> to fulfil<WH6213> the statutes<WH2706> and judgments<WH4941> which the LORD<WH3068> charged<WH6680> Moses<WH4872> with concerning Israel<WH3478>: be strong<WH2388>, and of good courage<WH553>; dread<WH3372> not, nor be dismayed<WH2865>.

Now, behold, in my trouble<WH6040> I have prepared<WH3559> for the house<WH1004> of the LORD<WH3068> an hundred<WH3967> thousand<WH505> talents<WH3603> of gold<WH2091>, and a thousand<WH505> thousand<WH505> talents<WH3603> of silver<WH3701>; and of brass<WH5178> and iron<WH1270> without weight<WH4948>; for it is in abundance<WH7230>: timber<WH6086> also and stone<WH68> have I prepared<WH3559>; and thou mayest add<WH3254> thereto.

Moreover there are workmen<WH6213><WH4399> with thee in abundance<WH7230>, hewers<WH2672> and workers<WH2796> of stone<WH68> and timber<WH6086>, and all manner of cunning men<WH2450> for every manner of work<WH4399>.
Of the gold<WH2091>, the silver<WH3701>, and the brass<WH5178>, and the iron<WH1270>, there is no number<WH4557>. Arise<WH6965> therefore, and be doing<WH6213>, and the LORD<WH3068> be with thee.
¶ David<WH1732> also commanded<WH6680> all the princes<WH8269> of Israel<WH3478> to help<WH5826> Solomon<WH8010> his son<WH1121>, saying,

Is not the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> with you? and hath he not given you rest<WH5117> on every side<WH5439>? for he hath given<WH5414> the inhabitants<WH3427> of the land<WH776> into mine hand<WH3027>; and the land<WH776> is subdued<WH3533> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068>, and before<WH6440> his people<WH5971>.

Now set<WH5414> your heart<WH3824> and your soul<WH5315> to seek<WH1875> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430>; arise<WH6965> therefore, and build<WH1129> ye the sanctuary<WH4720> of the LORD<WH3068> God<WH430>, to bring<WH935> the ark<WH727> of the covenant<WH1285> of the LORD<WH3068>, and the holy<WH6944> vessels<WH3627> of God<WH430>, into the house<WH1004> that is to be built<WH1129> to the name<WH8034> of the LORD<WH3068>.
